Job Title: Facilities - Mechanical Engineer - Aerospace Research

Location: Niskayuna, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Description SummaryThe Facilities Mechanical Engineer will support the site operations of GE Research, with focus on multiple projects in support of the mechanical design and operational needs of the Research Center. This includes ensuring safety and efficiency of operations across the organization, managing complex issues within functional areas of expertise, and involvement in long term planning.

Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or collegeMinimum of 5 years of experience in Facilities Mechanical EngineeringUS ******ship is required
